law.text: [ Text of section effective until November 4, 2012. For text effective November 4, 2012, see below.] The charges for the support of persons receiving care in said hospitals shall be at the rate determined by the division of health care finance and policy. Chapter 111: Charges for support; rate [ Text of section as amended by 2012, 224, Sec. 86 effective November 4, 2012. For text effective until November 4, 2012, see above.] The charges for the support of persons receiving care in said hospitals shall be at the rate determined by the executive office of health and human services or a governmental unit designated by the executive office.
